content.rendered:
Directed by Srijit Mukherji

Written by Priya Aven. Vijay Maurya

Star Taapsee Pannu(Mithali Raj). Vijay Raaz(Coach Sampath). Mumtaz Sorcar(Jhorna Ghosh). Iftekhar Mahmud(Murad). Brijendra Kala(BCCI Main Person). Richard Bhakti Klein(Sexist Journalist). Titeeksha Tawde(Khushi Anvekar). Jyoti Subhash(Mithali’s Grandmother). Swayam Joshi(Young Boy). Inayat Verma(Young Mithali Raj). Anushree Kushwaha(Noorie). Manohar Teli(BCCI Sidekick). Sampa Mandal(Nilu Paswan). Asad Ali Palijo(Nilu Paswan’s Husband). Tahir Anand(Shubodh). Birendra Yadav(BCCI Official). Sharad Gore(Pub Guy). Shilpi Marwaha(Sukumari Marwah). Nirali Oza(Preeti Valhar). Aditi Aryan(Sresha Badyal). Nishant Pradhan(Mithun Raj). Taral Almoula(Airport Official). Kasturi Jangam(Young Noorie). Alka Chatwal(Subodh’s Mother). Ayaz Memon(Press Reporter). Kalyani Jha(Perizad). Nisha Gilbert(Bharatnatyam Teacher). Mann Patel(Young Boy). Juhi Bharti(Rajeshwari Gayakwad Look Alike). Sohan Rana(BCCI Selector). Ramya Suresh(Himakshi Ganeshan). Anushka Shinde(World Cup Squad). Arun Malik(BCCI Sidekick). Sameer Dharmadhikari(Dorai Raj). Vaishak Nair(Chandan). Kajal Shishodia(Kajal Sutar). Vandita Rao(Mid Noorie). Angad Patwardhan(Indian Men Cricket Team Player). Kajal Sharma(Veda Krishnamurthy Look Alike). Raju Lodhia(BCCI Official). Niyati Jagtap(Mid Mithali). Kalyani Tapasi(Sushma Verma Look Alike). Darwesh Sayyed(Young Mithun). Medini Thakur(Bharatnatyam Girl). Sonal Paresh Bokhatariya(Physiotherapist). Priya Kumari(Roma Kwatra). Sanika Sakpal(Bharatnatyam Girl). Bhagyashree Choubisa(Noorie’s Mother). Radhika Thakkar(Radhika Nair). Manthan(Young Boy). Ravita Babita(World Cup Squad). Yug(Young Boy). Dheeraj Kumar(Indian Men Cricket Team Player). Ranvirsinh Vansia(Indian Men Cricket Team Player). Anand Sharma(Coach Unni). Vaishnavi Joshi(Bharatnatyam Girl). Nandita Trivedi(Nandita Domar). Tanishi Sakhalkar(Bharatnatyam Girl). Jaikumar Puri(Indian Men Cricket Team Player). Vaishnavi Desai(Vaishnavi Madiga). Shrikant Mungekar(Indian Men Cricket Team Player). Dhanashree Sable(Bharatnatyam Girl). Urbi Pal(Punam Raut Look Alike). Zandri Boshoff(International Team Player). Veronique Jade Du(International Team Player). Twane Slabbert(International Team Player). Bhupendra Singh(BCCI Selector). Parthivi Sawant(Bharatnatyam Girl). Riya Salap(Bharatnatyam Girl). Devadarsini Sukumaran(Leela Raj). Yash Bhalia(Young Boy). Chandra Bhan Meena(Indian Men Cricket Team Player). Siya Tiwari(Baby Ayat). Devanshi Ramane(Bharatnatyam Girl). Jaclyn Odette Kapp(International Team Player). Archana Pawar(Bharatnatyam Girl). Leepika Oza(Bharatnatyam Girl). Ramsingh Falkoti(Peon Bala). Manashree Gavande(Manashree Gavande). Akshaya Surve(Vamsi). Alok(Indian Men Cricket Team Player). Rajeev(Subodh’s Father). Subhashree Harne(Bharatnatyam Girl). Pradeep Solanki(BCCI Official). Amogh(Young Boy). Shraddha Saste(World Cup Squad). Avani Sagar(Bharatnatyam Girl). Mohit Prajapati(Noorie’s Friend). Tarun Basera(Indian Men Cricket Team Player). Neha Duboliya(Ekta Bisht Look Alike). Aditi Tonpe(Bharatnatyam Girl). Swara Aradkar(Bharatnatyam Girl). Tanvi Parab(World Cup Squad). Sanket Ghosalkar(PMO Assistant). Aadya Mhatre(Bharatnatyam Girl). Swayam Joshi(Young Boy (as Swayam)). Gautam Bhimani(Post-match Presenter). Ananya Vyas(Indian Men Cricket Team Player). Ojasvi Yadav(Bharatnatyam Girl). Arjun(Young Boy). Banveen Singh(Indian Men Cricket Team Player)

Language Hindi

Producers ALi Khan AK. Ajit Andhare. Vicky Bhatia. Gayatri Gulati. Pushkar Karmalkar. Vicky Mishra. Lalit Prem Sharma. Sushant Tungare. Sarmad Varraich

Production Colosceum Media. Viacom18
